attributes.action: Restrict islamic practice in the uk
attributes.additional_details: islam is increasingly impacting upon british lives. when in britain muslim people should conform to british culture and beliefs not impose their own upon us. restrictions should be implemented to force muslims to respect our culture as refusal to freely offer that respect is being increasingly demonstrated. banning islamic traditional dress of any kind, banning islamic teaching in schools and banning public gatherings, demonstrations or preachings are examples of measures which should be taken.
